ExampleGlkFactory An example of a class which meets defines the methods required by glkjni.GlkFactory.
GlkWindow  
 

Package glkjni Description

The interfaces required by the GlkJNI C library (Glk API version 0.7.0).

A Java frontend must include a glkjni package which contains:

  • a concrete class GlkFactory, and
  • interfaces, concrete classes, or abstract classes Glk, GlkWindow. and GlkSChannel.

This version of the glkjni packagecontains suitable definitions for the last three an appropriate version of GlkFactory must be defined in each frontend. The jglk package also provides other useful classes and interfaces, including convenient subclasses of {@code GlkWindow} for different window types.

See ExampleGlkFactory for the methods which GlkJNI requires from a GlkFactory class; if you want to write a frontend without using the jglk package, see ExampleGlkWindow for the methods required of the GlkWindow interface.

Implementation Notes

Glk functions that are completely handed by GlkJNI are not included in these interfaces.

Implementations of these interfaces can assume that method parameters are valid and meaningful as defined by the Glk API specification; if a C Glk function is called with invalid or ignorable values, GlkJNI will not bother to call its Java counterpart.

Version:
0.6
